api_baseurl.description: The base url for SAP Commerce Cloud API. Default: `https://portalrotapi.hana.ondemand.com/v2/subscriptions`

auth_token.description: The API token that grant you access to Commerce Cloud APIs. Can be specified with the `SAPCC_AUTH_TOKEN` environment variable.

subscription_id.description: The Subscription Id associated with the SAP Commerce Cloud. Can be specified with the `SAPCC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID` environment variable.

build_code.description: The build code associated with this deployment.

canceled_by.description: The UserId of the user who cancelled the deployment.

start_timestamp.description: The deployment start of the timestamp.

cancelation.description: If the deployment was cancelled, the cancellation details.

code.description: The deployment code assigned to this deployment.

created_by.description: The User Id of the user who created this build.

database_update_mode.description: The database update mode for the deployment.

environment_code.description: The environment code of the environment of the deployment.

failed_timestamp.description: If the deployment fails, the failed timestamp.

scheduled_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the deployment was initially scheduled.

strategy.description: The strategy used for this deployment.

subscription_code.description: The subscription id associated to the build.

undeployed_timestamp.description: If the deployment was rolledback, the rollback timestamp.

block.description: Creates & triggers a deployment for SAP Commerce Cloud. More information on the configuration parameters at [createDeployment api](https://help.sap.com/viewer/452dcbb0e00f47e88a69cdaeb87a925d/v1905/en-US/d80fd1dbefff4b8bbbbac66822d4a038.html)

application_code.description: The application code for the build.

branch.description: The name of the source branch used for creating the build.

build_end_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the build was ended.

build_start_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the build was started.

code.description: The build code for this build.

created_by.description: The S-user Id of the user who created this build.

name.description: The name of the build used when it was created.

properties.description: List of properties associated with this build.

status.description: The final status of this build.

subscription_code.description: The subscription id associated to the build.

block.description: Fetches the  Commerce Cloud build details for the provided build `code`. More information on the configuration parameters at [getBuild api](https://help.sap.com/viewer/452dcbb0e00f47e88a69cdaeb87a925d/v1905/en-US/9041daaf93c144acb4726f0c86e58337.html)

build_code.description: The build code associated with this deployment.

canceled_by.description: The UserId of the user who cancelled the deployment.

start_timestamp.description: The deployment start of the timestamp.

cancelation.description: If the deployment was cancelled, the cancellation details.

code.description: The deployment code assigned to this deployment.

created_by.description: The User Id of the user who created this build.

database_update_mode.description: The database update mode for the deployment.

environment_code.description: The environment code of the environment of the deployment.

failed_timestamp.description: If the deployment fails, the failed timestamp.

scheduled_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the deployment was initially scheduled.

strategy.description: The strategy used for this deployment.

subscription_code.description: The subscription id associated to the build.

undeployed_timestamp.description: If the deployment was rolledback, the rollback timestamp.

block.description: Fetches the  Commerce Cloud deployment details for the provided deployment `code`. More information on the configuration parameters at [getDeployment api](https://help.sap.com/viewer/452dcbb0e00f47e88a69cdaeb87a925d/v1905/en-US/d86d3539bd284410bc83817297a117ac.html)
